description:
The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!  The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can’t without his Millennium Puzzle!  Mankind’s last chance may lie with Shimon – he’s ready to turn the tables by calling forth a legendary and unstoppable obliterator!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La résurrection de Zorc l’obscur - 2e partie
伝説の守護神エクゾディア復活!
